channel.title: A Few Problems I Need Help With
channel.description:
Ok I have a few problems, who can help me out? :)
1. Changing the slot which custom items wield to, nearly all of mine wield to the weapon slot.
2. Is there a way I can change the XP rate to double or triple, without having to edit the XP rates? Like is there something that says like; XP rate = 1, which I can change?
3. How to I change the XP rate of "SKILLS" such as woodcutting, fishing, mining etc.?
Frosty.

item.title: A Few Problems I Need Help With
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

[quote=“EmulousGuru, post:9, topic:364024”][quote author=frostyboy07 link=topic=460257.msg3367211#msg3367211 date=1286887245]
True, I posted this because on the PI server i WAS working with, I edited the item slots in Item.java but it didn’t work, maybe because it’s PI and it is different and i’m not even too great with Delta yet xD.

Changing ‘Skill’ XP rate is hard for me xD, I still don’t get it :/, so i’m going to leave it :S

I’m all over the Combat XP, thanks.
[/quote]
Off topic here, but the original PI didn’t load the arrays, so it wouldn’t work correctly.
You have to enable the item slot arrays to be loaded.[/quote]
Ah, I was wrong there, sorry about that, never bothered opening the PI src.

Read full topic
item.source: A Few Problems I Need Help With

item.title: A Few Problems I Need Help With
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

[quote=“frostyboy07, post:8, topic:364024”]True, I posted this because on the PI server i WAS working with, I edited the item slots in Item.java but it didn’t work, maybe because it’s PI and it is different and i’m not even too great with Delta yet xD.

Changing ‘Skill’ XP rate is hard for me xD, I still don’t get it :/, so i’m going to leave it :S

I’m all over the Combat XP, thanks.[/quote]
Off topic here, but the original PI didn’t load the arrays, so it wouldn’t work correctly.
You have to enable the item slot arrays to be loaded.

Read full topic

EDIT: APPARENTLY I CAN’T REP YOU, I NEED 15 REP MYSELF TO REP OTHERS, LOL.

item.title: A Few Problems I Need Help With
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

I don’t want kids, so I’ll adopt, let me go grab a spoon.

question 1:
item.java -> int[] - look for playerCape, etc.

question 2:
public boolean addSkillXP(int amount, int skill) {
if(rate == 1)
amount = amount*2;

declare “private boolean rate = 1;” at the top, obviously, 1 = times 2, 0 = regular, edit *2 to preferred multiply

edit: question 3:
look for playerLevel]), playerLevel[]), etc
replace playerLevel] with playerWoodcutting, etc, and playerLevel[] with the skill ID
it should look like addSkillXP(220, playerLevel[12]); and so on

Read full topic
item.source: A Few Problems I Need Help With
